comments.body: Does this imply that stale files will be left in the build directory on Windows? Could this result in an incorrect build?
I could not reproduce this on a real filesystem, which leads me to believe it is only an issue with the memory filesystem.
qq: is it worth checking the exception message as well?
The exception is pretty nothingburger, the meaningful message is over stderr from checks like https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/master/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/flutter_manifest.dart#L206
